title: Colin Moriarty Answers Jemi Bitti
description:
Jemi Bitti asked me to tell Colin something over on Up at Noon: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9fVpPW7McjU. Here, I do it. 

Watch more Conversations with Colin: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL85130F65C312F61E&feature=plcp

transcript_chunks.text: hey Colin Jemi Bitti writes and oh yeah Greg Miller looks like my dad a lot could you tell him that for me every time I see him pondering in the videos he's like the village Elder that everyone turns to what are you doing I'm I'm filming why we'll put this up then as a video what what are you filming I'm filming your response to Jemi Bitti I see this right now yeah what do you want me to say what what him he said all he wanted me to do is tell you so I've told you thank you I appreciate that
